title: Owner advocates for municipal policies supporting exit-to-community conversions
description: Owner advocates for municipal policies supporting exit-to-community conversions
content:
Scenario: Owner advocates for municipal policies supporting exit-to-community conversions
    Given Rosa's successful transition positions her as credible advocate
    And municipal policy could support or obstruct future conversions
    When Rosa testifies to city council about conversion benefits
    Then her personal story demonstrates exit-to-community is dignified and viable
    And she advocates for: business conversion support programs and community investment tax credits
    And city council hears directly from small business owner who chose democratic path
    And her advocacy influences municipal economic development strategy
    And municipality_elohim coordinates advocate network across converted owners
